description: The app works just as I need it for synchronizing my school work files. It's sometimes annoying to connect and might give you notifications but that's just small stuff that can be changed in the configurations. I'm happy with it, best synchronizing app for Linux.
Latest version on the website is a few versions ahead. This has a broken icon and missing features.
It works, my main complaint is it looks outdated.
This software is useful and works efficiently but in the `Activity` panel some fonts are displayed incorrectly, it would be better if these bugs were fixed.
L'application permet la synchronisation des dossiers mais fonctionne bizarrement. Passer par le dépot du site officiel de nextcloud permet d'avoir une application plus fonctionnelle.
